definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Two cases of cholera, one of which has ended fatally, have occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏發生過兩起霍亂病例，其中一人已經死亡。

sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我們這樣做，現已經有十九年了。

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 當地的商店已經開始出售法國棍式麪包和比利時啤酒。

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 數量龐大的軍隊已經被高技術軍隊取代。

sentences.english: The book was out of print, but I eventually ran it to earth at a secondhand bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 那本書已經絕版，但我終於在一家舊書店淘到了它。

sentences.english: B. The college I applied to has accepted me.
sentences.chinese: 我報了名的學院已經錄取了我。

sentences.english: This is a function declaring the hot summer has been coming.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個宣告火辣的夏天已經來臨的儀式。

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知識產權已經成爲外交外貿領域的重要議題。

sentences.english: The one hundred and first meridian was passed.
sentences.chinese: 現在已經越過了經線一百零一度了。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話已經使發展中國家跨越了固話網絡這個階段。

sentences.english: I have the answer when I am in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 當我身臨歐亞時，我已經知道了。

sentences.english: It was time to write down and acknowledge that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 這是記下和承認它已經離去這一事實的時候。

sentences.english: Doudou has been home half a month, how I miss him.
sentences.chinese: 豆豆回家已經半個月了，我好想他啊。

sentences.english: They've already implanted electrodes into blind patients on a temporary basis, allowing them to see flashes of light.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經爲盲者植入暫時的義眼，讓他們能看到閃光。

sentences.english: The thief had run more than forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 那個小偷已經跑了四十多里路。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
